## Classes

### <a name="helix--broker"></a>`helix::broker`

This class manages the helix broker (p4broker).

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `helix::broker` class:

* [`pkgname`](#-helix--broker--pkgname)

##### <a name="-helix--broker--pkgname"></a>`pkgname`

Data type: `String`

This parameter can be used to specify the package name of the helix broker. The default
value (helix-broker) is provided by the helix_broker_pkg variable in the helix::params class.

Default value: `$helix::params::helix_broker_pkg`

### <a name="helix--client"></a>`helix::client`

Class: helix::client
===========================

Manages the helix command-line client (p4).

Parameters
----------

* `pkgname`
This parameter can be used to specify the package name of the helix client. The default
value (helix-cli) is provided by the helix_cli_pkg variable in the helix::params class

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `helix::client` class:

* [`pkgname`](#-helix--client--pkgname)

##### <a name="-helix--client--pkgname"></a>`pkgname`

Data type: `String`



Default value: `$helix::params::helix_cli_pkg`

### <a name="helix--debian"></a>`helix::debian`

Class: helix::debian
===========================

Manages the custom debian perforce repo and installs the specified package

Parameters
----------

* `pkgname`
This required parameter specifies the package to be installed
* `pubkey_url`
* `p4_key_fingerprint`
* `p4_distro_location`
* `p4_distro_release`

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `helix::debian` class:

* [`pkgname`](#-helix--debian--pkgname)
* [`pubkey_url`](#-helix--debian--pubkey_url)
* [`p4_key_fingerprint`](#-helix--debian--p4_key_fingerprint)
* [`p4_distro_location`](#-helix--debian--p4_distro_location)
* [`p4_distro_release`](#-helix--debian--p4_distro_release)

##### <a name="-helix--debian--pkgname"></a>`pkgname`

Data type: `String`



##### <a name="-helix--debian--pubkey_url"></a>`pubkey_url`

Data type: `String`



Default value: `$helix::params::pubkey_url`

##### <a name="-helix--debian--p4_key_fingerprint"></a>`p4_key_fingerprint`

Data type: `String`



Default value: `$helix::params::p4_key_fingerprint`

### <a name="helix--params"></a>`helix::params`

This class contains parameters and variables used by the other classes in the Helix module.

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `helix::params` class:

* [`p4_key_fingerprint`](#-helix--params--p4_key_fingerprint)
* [`perforce_package_url`](#-helix--params--perforce_package_url)
* [`helix_cli_pkg`](#-helix--params--helix_cli_pkg)
* [`helix_broker_pkg`](#-helix--params--helix_broker_pkg)
* [`helix_proxy_pkg`](#-helix--params--helix_proxy_pkg)
* [`helix_p4d_pkg`](#-helix--params--helix_p4d_pkg)

##### <a name="-helix--params--p4_key_fingerprint"></a>`p4_key_fingerprint`

Data type: `String`

The fingerprint of the Perforce public key. This value may need to be updated if
Perforce updates the public key. # @param pubkey_url [String]
The URL for the Perforce public key.

##### <a name="-helix--params--perforce_package_url"></a>`perforce_package_url`

Data type: `String`

The base URL for the Perforce package repository.

##### <a name="-helix--params--helix_cli_pkg"></a>`helix_cli_pkg`

Data type: `String`

The package name for the Helix CLI tool.

##### <a name="-helix--params--helix_broker_pkg"></a>`helix_broker_pkg`

Data type: `String`

The package name for the Helix broker (p4broker).

##### <a name="-helix--params--helix_proxy_pkg"></a>`helix_proxy_pkg`

Data type: `String`

The package name for the Helix proxy.

##### <a name="-helix--params--helix_p4d_pkg"></a>`helix_p4d_pkg`

Data type: `String`

The package name for the Helix server (p4d).

## Defined types

### <a name="helix--broker_instance"></a>`helix::broker_instance`

Defines a Helix broker instance

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `helix::broker_instance` defined type:

* [`p4brokerport`](#-helix--broker_instance--p4brokerport)
* [`p4brokertarget`](#-helix--broker_instance--p4brokertarget)
* [`directory`](#-helix--broker_instance--directory)
* [`p4ssl`](#-helix--broker_instance--p4ssl)
* [`logfile`](#-helix--broker_instance--logfile)
* [`debuglevel`](#-helix--broker_instance--debuglevel)
* [`adminname`](#-helix--broker_instance--adminname)
* [`adminphone`](#-helix--broker_instance--adminphone)
* [`adminemail`](#-helix--broker_instance--adminemail)
* [`serviceuser`](#-helix--broker_instance--serviceuser)
* [`ticketfile`](#-helix--broker_instance--ticketfile)
* [`redirection`](#-helix--broker_instance--redirection)
* [`commands`](#-helix--broker_instance--commands)
* [`osuser`](#-helix--broker_instance--osuser)
* [`osgroup`](#-helix--broker_instance--osgroup)
* [`ensure`](#-helix--broker_instance--ensure)
* [`enabled`](#-helix--broker_instance--enabled)
* [`p4dctl`](#-helix--broker_instance--p4dctl)

##### <a name="-helix--broker_instance--p4brokerport"></a>`p4brokerport`

Data type: `String`

The broker's P4PORT value

##### <a name="-helix--broker_instance--p4brokertarget"></a>`p4brokertarget`

Data type: `String`

The target server's P4PORT value

##### <a name="-helix--broker_instance--directory"></a>`directory`

Data type: `String`

(Optional) The directory where the broker instance should be installed.
Defaults to "/opt/perforce/servers/${title}"

Default value: `"/opt/perforce/servers/${title}"`

##### <a name="-helix--broker_instance--p4ssl"></a>`p4ssl`

Data type: `String`

(Optional) The directory where SSL certificates will be stored.
Defaults to "/opt/perforce/servers/${title}/ssl"

Default value: `"/opt/perforce/servers/${title}/ssl"`

##### <a name="-helix--broker_instance--logfile"></a>`logfile`

Data type: `String`

(Optional) The path to the broker instance's log file.
Defaults to "/var/log/perforce/${title}_broker.log"

Default value: `"/var/log/perforce/${title}_broker.log"`

##### <a name="-helix--broker_instance--debuglevel"></a>`debuglevel`

Data type: `Integer`

(Optional) The debug level for the broker instance. Defaults to 1.

Default value: `'1'`

##### <a name="-helix--broker_instance--adminname"></a>`adminname`

Data type: `String`

(Optional) The name of the administrator for the broker instance.
Defaults to "Perforce Admins"

Default value: `'Perforce Admins'`

##### <a name="-helix--broker_instance--adminphone"></a>`adminphone`

Data type: `String`

(Optional) The phone number for the administrator of the broker instance.
Defaults to "999/911"

Default value: `'999/911'`

##### <a name="-helix--broker_instance--adminemail"></a>`adminemail`

Data type: `String`

(Optional) The email address for the administrator of the broker instance.
Defaults to "perforce-admins@example.com"

Default value: `'perforce-admins@example.com'`

##### <a name="-helix--broker_instance--serviceuser"></a>`serviceuser`

Data type: `Optional[String]`

(Optional) The user under which the broker service should run.

Default value: `undef`

##### <a name="-helix--broker_instance--ticketfile"></a>`ticketfile`

Data type: `Optional[String]`

(Optional) The path to the ticket file for the broker instance.

Default value: `undef`

##### <a name="-helix--broker_instance--redirection"></a>`redirection`

Data type: `String`

(Optional) The redirection mode for the broker instance.
Defaults to "selective"

Default value: `'selective'`

##### <a name="-helix--broker_instance--commands"></a>`commands`

Data type: `Array[String]`

(Optional) An array of commands to execute when the broker instance starts up.

Default value: `[]`

##### <a name="-helix--broker_instance--osuser"></a>`osuser`

Data type: `String`

(Optional) The user under which to run the broker instance.
Defaults to "perforce"

Default value: `'perforce'`

##### <a name="-helix--broker_instance--osgroup"></a>`osgroup`

Data type: `String`

(Optional) The group under which to run the broker instance.
Defaults to "perforce"

Default value: `'perforce'`

##### <a name="-helix--broker_instance--ensure"></a>`ensure`

Data type: `String`

(Optional) Whether the broker instance should be running or stopped.
Defaults to "running"

Default value: `'running'`

##### <a name="-helix--broker_instance--enabled"></a>`enabled`

Data type: `Boolean`

(Optional) Whether the broker instance should be enabled.
Defaults to true.

Default value: `true`

##### <a name="-helix--broker_instance--p4dctl"></a>`p4dctl`

Data type: `Optional[String]`

(Optional) The path to the p4dctl command. Defaults to the value
defined in the helix::params class.

Default value: `undef`

### <a name="helix--package"></a>`helix::package`

Install a package on different Linux distributions

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `helix::package` defined type:

* [`pkgname`](#-helix--package--pkgname)

##### <a name="-helix--package--pkgname"></a>`pkgname`

Data type: `String`

The name of the package to install

### <a name="helix--proxy_instance"></a>`helix::proxy_instance`

This defined type manages a Helix proxy instance. It configures the proxy
instance and manages its service.

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `helix::proxy_instance` defined type:

* [`p4proxyport`](#-helix--proxy_instance--p4proxyport)
* [`p4proxytarget`](#-helix--proxy_instance--p4proxytarget)
* [`cachedir`](#-helix--proxy_instance--cachedir)
* [`p4ssl`](#-helix--proxy_instance--p4ssl)
* [`logfile`](#-helix--proxy_instance--logfile)
* [`osuser`](#-helix--proxy_instance--osuser)
* [`osgroup`](#-helix--proxy_instance--osgroup)
* [`ensure`](#-helix--proxy_instance--ensure)
* [`enabled`](#-helix--proxy_instance--enabled)
* [`p4dctl`](#-helix--proxy_instance--p4dctl)

##### <a name="-helix--proxy_instance--p4proxyport"></a>`p4proxyport`

Data type: `String`

The port on which the proxy instance listens.

##### <a name="-helix--proxy_instance--p4proxytarget"></a>`p4proxytarget`

Data type: `String`

The address of the Helix server that the proxy instance forwards
requests to.

##### <a name="-helix--proxy_instance--cachedir"></a>`cachedir`

Data type: `String`

The cache directory used by the proxy instance.

Default value: `"/opt/perforce/servers/${title}/cache"`

##### <a name="-helix--proxy_instance--p4ssl"></a>`p4ssl`

Data type: `String`

The SSL directory used by the proxy instance.

Default value: `"/opt/perforce/servers/${title}/ssl"`

##### <a name="-helix--proxy_instance--logfile"></a>`logfile`

Data type: `String`

The path to the proxy instance's log file.

Default value: `"/var/log/perforce/${title}_proxy.log"`

##### <a name="-helix--proxy_instance--osuser"></a>`osuser`

Data type: `String`

The user under which the proxy instance runs.

Default value: `'perforce'`

##### <a name="-helix--proxy_instance--osgroup"></a>`osgroup`

Data type: `String`

The group under which the proxy instance runs.

Default value: `'perforce'`

##### <a name="-helix--proxy_instance--ensure"></a>`ensure`

Data type: `String`

The desired state of the proxy instance service. Can be either
'running' or 'stopped'.

Default value: `'running'`

##### <a name="-helix--proxy_instance--enabled"></a>`enabled`

Data type: `Boolean`

Whether the proxy instance is enabled or not.

Default value: `true`

##### <a name="-helix--proxy_instance--p4dctl"></a>`p4dctl`

Data type: `Optional[String]`

The path to the p4dctl command used to manage the proxy instance
service.

Default value: `undef`

### <a name="helix--server_instance"></a>`helix::server_instance`

Defines a Helix server instance.

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `helix::server_instance` defined type:

* [`p4port`](#-helix--server_instance--p4port)
* [`p4root`](#-helix--server_instance--p4root)
* [`p4depots`](#-helix--server_instance--p4depots)
* [`p4log`](#-helix--server_instance--p4log)
* [`p4journal`](#-helix--server_instance--p4journal)
* [`p4ssl`](#-helix--server_instance--p4ssl)
* [`osuser`](#-helix--server_instance--osuser)
* [`osgroup`](#-helix--server_instance--osgroup)
* [`ensure`](#-helix--server_instance--ensure)
* [`enabled`](#-helix--server_instance--enabled)
* [`p4dctl`](#-helix--server_instance--p4dctl)

##### <a name="-helix--server_instance--p4port"></a>`p4port`

Data type: `String`

: The Perforce server port number (e.g., "1666").

##### <a name="-helix--server_instance--p4root"></a>`p4root`

Data type: `String`

: The root directory of the Perforce server instance (default: "/opt/perforce/servers/<instance_name>/root").

Default value: `"/opt/perforce/servers/${title}/root"`

##### <a name="-helix--server_instance--p4depots"></a>`p4depots`

Data type: `String`

: The depots directory of the Perforce server instance (default: "/opt/perforce/servers/<instance_name>/depots").

Default value: `"/opt/perforce/servers/${title}/depots"`

##### <a name="-helix--server_instance--p4log"></a>`p4log`

Data type: `String`

: The path to the Perforce server log file (default: "/var/log/perforce/<instance_name>_server.log").

Default value: `"/var/log/perforce/${title}_server.log"`

##### <a name="-helix--server_instance--p4journal"></a>`p4journal`

Data type: `String`

: The path to the Perforce server journal file (default: "/opt/perforce/servers/<instance_name>/checkpoints/journal").

Default value: `"/opt/perforce/servers/${title}/checkpoints/journal"`

##### <a name="-helix--server_instance--p4ssl"></a>`p4ssl`

Data type: `String`

: The path to the Perforce server SSL directory (default: "/opt/perforce/servers/<instance_name>/ssl").

Default value: `"/opt/perforce/servers/${title}/ssl"`

##### <a name="-helix--server_instance--osuser"></a>`osuser`

Data type: `String`

: The name of the user who owns the Perforce server instance files (default: "perforce").

Default value: `'perforce'`

##### <a name="-helix--server_instance--osgroup"></a>`osgroup`

Data type: `String`

: The name of the group that owns the Perforce server instance files (default: "perforce").

Default value: `'perforce'`

##### <a name="-helix--server_instance--ensure"></a>`ensure`

Data type: `String`

: Whether the service should be running or stopped (default: "running").

Default value: `'running'`

##### <a name="-helix--server_instance--enabled"></a>`enabled`

Data type: `Boolean`

: Whether the instance should be enabled (default: true).

Default value: `true`

##### <a name="-helix--server_instance--p4dctl"></a>`p4dctl`

Data type: `Optional[String]`

Optional[[String]]: The path to the `p4dctl` command (default: `undef`).

Default value: `undef`
